name: com.dh.dh_abilities
description: This system provides a framework and some samples to implement abilities. Check Github for feature list.

samples.description: Implements a super simple example that triggers an ability, that writes to the console when pressing the "1"-button on the keyboard. Note: it requires the InputSystem, but you can also just delete the input and wire up a AbilitySystemComponent.TryUseAbility(0) call yourself.
Same as Example Setup. But for if you disabled the vanilla inputs and use Input System instead.
More complex example setup with UI elements.
